channel.title: Help with donator rights[[delta]]
channel.description: ok, how do i make it say you need to be a donator to weild this item on an item??? please give code, and where to put it! plzzzzzzz

item.title: Help with donator rights[[delta]]
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

the error is, even if the player has donator == 0, it still gives the person the items![br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 13, 2009, 05:00:46 pm[/size][hr]thank you chassy! now if you could give me the command to make all three items donator only, like if a non donator tries to wear it it says u need to be a donator to wear this item?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 13, 2009, 05:04:23 pm[/size][hr]anyone?

Read full topic

item.title: Help with donator rights[[delta]]
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

if(command.startsWith("donated") && donator == 1) { addItem(8001, 1); addItem(8002, 1); addItem(13665, 1); } else { sM("you are not a donator... sorryyy."); }

Read full topic
